rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming vestibule with Vastu-compliant layout ensuring entry of positive energy. It includes built-in storage and a decorative archway.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space integrating living, dining, and kitchen areas in line with Chettinad architectural style featuring intricate carved wooden panels and traditional motifs. Vastu guidelines ensure the master seat is placed in the southwest corner.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: A dual-purpose room that functions as a bedroom during night and an office/study area during day. Designed with ample windows for natural light adhering to local building norms.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An accessible rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and garden activities. It features built-in seating, a mini water feature for acoustical balance, and is Vastu-aligned with openings oriented towards the east for morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Garden Courtyard
rooms.description: A spacious garden area adjacent to the apartment entrance that incorporates native flora, water bodies, and stone pathways consistent with Chettinad landscaping. The layout ensures ample greenery while adhering to safety regulations.

openings.description: A wide entry door installed in a north-facing wall to enhance auspicious entrance energy according to Vastu guidelines.
Large sliding windows placed strategically for optimal natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy.
